name: chia-sprout-cli
description: CLI tool to deploy a website on datalayer

scripts.create-win-x64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node18-win-x64 --out-path build
scripts.create-mac-x64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node18-macos-x64 --out-path build
scripts.create-linux-x64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node18-linux-x64 --out-path build
scripts.create-linux-arm64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node18-linux-arm64 --out-path build

author: Michael Taylor
